title: Congress should have allied with JDS: Mamata Banerjee
article_body: NEW DELHI: West Bengal Chief Minister on Tuesday said the would have done much better in the election if it had allied with the (JDS). Banerjee did not name the but congratulated the "winners". "Congratulations to the winners of the elections. For those who lost, fight back. If Congress had gone into an alliance with the JDS, the result would have been different. Very different," she tweeted.
description: NEW DELHI: West Bengal Chief Minister on Tuesday said the would have done much better in the election if it had allied with the (JDS).
